original_title: Aluísio, O Silêncio E O Mar
overview: The silence of the days packs Aluísio's lonely life. From the waters that were once Josiah's loss, he finds Jonas, unconscious and wounded. Under the constant gaze of the sea, the passing of the days, and the relationship that arises, their lives become intertwined.
title: Aluísio, the Silence and the Sea
